text:
Heli Snowshoeing in the Canadian
Rocky Mount
just landed on Lesk HIll to do some snowshoeing and man, what a route we took to get here.

We went all the way into Banff National Park saw
the beautiful Assiniboine which was

amazing, valleys opening up on the right
and left

We saw crevasses, the Spray Lakes opened up in
front of us just was by far the best
helicopter tour I have ever done
Off we go, we're going snowshoeing. Follow me.
Don't follow me, follow them! I don't know where I'm going.
Well this is the big reveal. My God.
Coming out and snowshoeing after that spectacular flight.
And if you love adventure, make sure to subscribe to our channel!
